extensionDescription.message: Set your Discord status to a customizable countdown timer.

errorInvalidDateTime.message: Please enter a valid date and time.
errorInvalidDateTime.description: The datetime input field is either empty or incomplete.

errorInvalidInterval.description: The interval input field is empty.

errorMissingToken.message: Your Discord token is unknown. Please log in to or refresh discord.com
errorMissingToken.description: The user's Discord token is unknown.

errorInvalidToken.message: Your Discord token is invalid. Please log in to or refresh discord.com
errorInvalidToken.description: The user's Discord token is invalid or has expired.
